member.summary: Initializes FFImageLoading with given Configuration. It allows to configure and override most of it.

member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a file.

member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a URL.

member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a file from application bundle.

member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a compiled drawable resource.
member.param: Name of the resource in drawable folder without extension

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.ImageService.LoadStream(System.Func{System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Threading.Tasks.Task{System.IO.Stream}})
member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a Stream.
member.param: A function that allows a CancellationToken and returns the Stream to use. This function will be invoked by LoadStream().

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.ImageService.ExitTasksEarly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether ImageService will exit tasks earlier
member.value: true if it should exit tasks early; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.ImageService.SetExitTasksEarly(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether ImageService will exit tasks earlier
member.param: If set to true exit tasks early.

member.summary: Sets a value indicating if all loading work should be paused (silently canceled).
member.param: If set to true pause/cancel work.

member.summary: Cancel any loading work for the given ImageView

member.summary: Removes a pending image loading task from the work queue.

member.summary: Invalidates the disk cache.

member.param: Memory cache, Disk cache or both
If similar keys should be removed, ie: typically keys with extra transformations

member.summary: Only use this method if you plan to handle exceptions in your code. Awaiting this method will give you this flexibility.
member.param: Image view that should receive the image.

member.summary: Invalidate the image corresponding to given parameters from given caches.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.FFImage.RetryCountProperty
member.summary: The retry count property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.RetryCount
member.summary: If image loading fails automatically retry it a number of times, with a specific delay. Sets number of retries.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.FFImage.RetryDelayProperty
member.summary: The retry delay property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.RetryDelay
member.summary: If image loading fails automatically retry it a number of times, with a specific delay. Sets delay in milliseconds between each trial

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.FFImage.DownsampleWidthProperty
member.summary: The downsample width property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.DownsampleWidth
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. Optional DownsampleWidth parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this width while keeping aspect ratio.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.FFImage.DownsampleHeightProperty
member.summary: The downsample height property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.DownsampleHeight
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. Optional DownsampleHeight parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this height while keeping aspect ratio.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.DownsampleToViewSize
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. DownsampleWidth and DownsampleHeight properties will be automatically set to view size If the view height or width will not return > 0 - it'll fall back to using DownsampleWidth / DownsampleHeight properties values
member.value: true if downsample to view size; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.DownsampleMode
member.summary: Set interpolation (resizing) algorithm.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.DownsampleUseDipUnits
member.summary: If set to true DownsampleWidth and DownsampleHeight properties will use density independent pixels for downsampling
member.value: true if downsample use dip units; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.FFImage.CacheDurationProperty
member.summary: The cache duration property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.CacheDuration
member.summary: How long the file will be cached on disk.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.FFImage.LoadingPriorityProperty
member.summary: The Loading Priority property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.LoadingPriority
member.summary: Defines the loading priority, the default is LoadingPriority.Normal

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.FFImage.CacheTypeProperty
member.summary: The cache type property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.CacheType
member.summary: Set the cache storage type, (Memory, Disk, All). by default cache is set to All.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.FFImage.FadeAnimationEnabledProperty
member.summary: The fade animation enabled property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.FadeAnimationEnabled
member.summary: Indicates if the fade animation effect should be enabled. By default this value comes from ImageService.Instance.Config.FadeAnimationEnabled.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.FFImage.TransformPlaceholders

member.summary: Gets or sets the transformations.
